originalText.text:
So thrilled to have WooWoo newly in the neighborhood! Usually wash and shave my dog myself but do such a poor job, so felt pretty embarrassed bringing my dog to the groomers all matted and in need of a shave.

WooWoo took him day of and gave him the best grooming Iâ€™ve ever seen. They are so welcoming, patient and non-judge mental and the wash, groom and nail trimming was super affordable. See the before and after photos - he looks like a proper gentleman!ðŸ¥° Will definitely be coming back!

originalText.text: I am so glad that Woo Woo grooming opened up in the neighborhood! Leo does such an incredible job, and my pup always gets so many compliments on his fresh cut. What makes it even better is that the guys are super nice, warm and friendly. Just such a great experience all around!

text.text: I am so glad that Woo Woo grooming opened up in the neighborhood! Leo does such an incredible job, and my pup always gets so many compliments on his fresh cut. What makes it even better is that the guys are super nice, warm and friendly. Just such a great experience all around!

originalText.text:
The before pic is her sitting on the floor. My dog was legit black listed from petsmart due to her high anxiety and needing 2 groomers to groom her there.... I was literally told they can't book appointments for her after going to them for 2 years.

Needless to say I was so nervous embaressed and hesitant looking for a new groomer. WooWoo was highly recommended to me by a neighbor as I was explaining to her about my dogs anxiety and need for a haircut. I was excited as they are just 2 blocks away and made an appointment right away.  They space is so cute and they are so warm and welcoming. I stressed to them that she's super anxious with her muzzle and paws, was black listed due to her high anxiety etc etc and they assured me they will work with her. I also explained what kind of cut I wanted , specific tail trimming etc. I was surprised how quickly they completed her groom AND they were able to check off all my requests. They saw she grew anxious when they used the electric clippers near her head so they switched to scissors and she was fine. They were even able to trim her paws AND nail grind!! I was so happy how understanding, calm and accommodating they were to our baby.  You can see how good they are with dogs as they were smoothing and caressing her muzzle showing how they worked with her and she didn't even snarl. I will definitely continue going to them and highly recommend them. Thank you for the wonderful service you showed my little girl.

originalText.text: I was delighted with the job that these lovely guys did on my dogs. They are a real asset to have in the area, and I have no hesitation at all in recommending them to others. I appreciated how they gave a cut that was appropriate for Havanese, and they did a beautiful job on nails, feet, sanitary areas. Will absolutely go again!

I appreciated how they gave a cut that was appropriate for Havanese, and they did a beautiful job on nails, feet, sanitary areas. Will absolutely go again!

originalText.text:
My girl is very sensitive/jumpy but I was highly impressed with how comfortable she felt at WooWoo. She ended up beautiful after her grooming, soft and scented.
This will be our go-to grooming place from now on!
